name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exploitation
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker utilized a command-line interface to execute unauthorized scripts on multiple servers.

parallel--92a51a38-0c9a-4004-b92f-d5f716.description: Simultaneously execute all necessary mitigation actions.

action--1ca9b8f4-fc8d-4c8e-8b4e-d2f6cfba.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--6c2313fd-c6aa-4e82-b614-570bc15d.name: Remove dropped files
action--6c2313fd-c6aa-4e82-b614-570bc15d.description: Remove any unauthorized files dropped onto the system.

while-condition--b1f2c6a5-bd8e-4576-80a1.description: Loop to restore configuration until integrity check passes.

action--7a1e3198-fcbe-45e0-bf73-bcc5fd6e.description: Restore the critical configuration file from backup.
